description: Submission of details of site management arrangements, pursuant to Condition 15; details of Commercial Plant Noise and Vibration Assessment, pursuant to Condition 25; details of Commercial/Resi Sound Insulation, pursuant to Condition 26; details of Odour Abatement Equipment, pursuant to Condition 28; and details of artificial lighting levels(candelas/ m2 size of sign/advertisement), pursuant to Condition 31, all conditions in relation to Buildings B2 and C, of planning permission reference: 2011/00407/COMB dated 23rd December 2011.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Hammersmith Embankment Site Known As 'Fulham Reach'Land Bounded By Chancellor's Road,Distillery Road And Winslow Road,Including Sections Of Thames Path, River Thames,Frank Banfield Park And Highway LandLondon W6
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
